narrative.narrative: Chukotavia is based at Anadyr,Russia in the Chukotka Autonomous Okrug, the eastern most region of Russia. It goes from there to six other Chukotka airports at Egvekinot,Keperveyem,Lavrentiya, Markovo,Pevek and Provideniya. Its shortest route is 232km and the longest is 641. The mean distance among all six is 469.333km's. The airline started in 1996. At November 2012 it had three Antonov 26's, an Antonov 24 and two Mil Mi-8 helicopters. It was planning on replacing the helicopters with new DHC-6-400 Twin Otters made by Viking Air from Canada.
